title: Koiâ˜†Sento (Coicent)
synopsis: It's a quick time jump to the 26th century where a school trip to a rebuilt 21st century city turns into a wild adventure for teenaged Shinichi. While chasing a talking deer that steals his bag, he runs into a strange girl trying to elude even stranger pursuers, and then things get really wild. It's a mad dash through a city of the past as two young people discover a chance at a new future.
voices: ['Kotobuki, Minako', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Ono, Kensho', 'Koyasu, Takehito', 'Inada, Tetsu', 'Isobe, Masako']
staff: [['Uchida, Kenji', ['Producer']], ['Morita, Shuuhei', ['Director', ' Series Composition']], ['Tsuruoka, Youta', ['Sound Director']], ['Kotobuki, Minako', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
